Description: Production-ready VPC infrastructure with multi-tier networking for financial trading platform

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix for resource names to enable multiple deployments
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

PublicSubnetIds.Description: Comma-separated list of Public Subnet IDs

PrivateSubnetIds.Description: Comma-separated list of Private Subnet IDs

DatabaseSubnetIds.Description: Comma-separated list of Database Subnet IDs

NatGatewayIds.Description: Comma-separated list of NAT Gateway IDs

VPCFlowLogsLogGroupName.Description: VPC Flow Logs CloudWatch Log Group Name
